segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene unfold before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems completely engrossed in polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her diligently wiping it with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly blank, almost serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water! It's gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is completely full and overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the cabinet doors in a constant sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A significant puddle is forming on the floor, right where she stands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water soaking her shoe and foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how unaware she is of the immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear the damage this will cause to the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This routine task has taken a bizarre turn.
segments.speaker: PAR
